projects.name: Chef Tom
projects.description: Besides coding, I love cooking. So I built my own first Native app where I can keep my best recipes!
projects.stack: React-Native, useContext for State management. Since I built this app to practice mobile development only, it isn't published

projects.name: Kingpad
projects.description: A fully responsive landing-page I built for Kingworld Finance, collaborating with a team of designers & developers, pixel-perfectly duplicating a Figma design
projects.stack: Next.JS, Tailwind CSS, Typescript, Material UI, Figma. The app is fully responsive following the mobile-first workflow

projects.name: Eurafrique
projects.description: A fully responsive, multilingual website (French, English, Spanish and Arabic) I am developing for the association Eurafrique.eu.
projects.stack: React, react-router, SCSS, i18next (for the multilingual functionality), useContext (for State management) & Cpanel (for the hosting). The backend is built using Supabase (Backend as a Service / BaaS)

projects.name: Farmhouse Table
projects.description: A restaurant website integrating Google Maps API and a reservation form
projects.stack: React, SCSS, Typescript, Bootstrap, external API integration, responsive layouts. The app is fully responsive following the mobile-first workflow

projects.name: Todayzzz Todos
projects.description: A simple drag & drop todo app to organize your daily tasks I built to practice Typescript, adding some cool React libraries
projects.stack: React, SCSS, Typescript. I wanted to challenge myself with the drag & drop feature and got it working! The app offers a dark/light mode switch. I also created a BaaS (Backend as a Service) server on Supabase, the app is now interacting with an API

projects.name: Partymates
projects.description: A full-stack MERN sort of social media app I created to connect people so they can travel to festivals together. Users can create an account, save or subscribe to events and interact with other users
projects.stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, REST API (built by me), Postman. The app is fully responsive, following the mobile first workflow

projects.name: The Broke Globetrotter
projects.description: An app created in pairs, gathering collections of free stuff to do in cities worldwide featuring back-end technologies, for broke travellers (story of my life..!)
projects.stack: MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, Bootstrap, Handlebars, Postman

projects.name: Pickle Rick vs Rats - The Game
projects.description: My first coding project, a cool Javascript shooting game, kill the angry rats!
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, Javascript. Since you need a keypad for the commands, it is only playable on desktop
